attributes.action: The 9% increase that MPs have given themselves should be reduced to the rate of inflation, which is more than fair in the current climate.
attributes.additional_details:
MPs pay is not particularly well paid, however it would be pertinent to wait until the country is in a better financial state before awarding your selves such a large pay rise.
Please think of your constituents and the real hard ship some people are suffering.   I want you to cancel this pay rise and take the rate of inflation as it is morally right and setting a good example.
